list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor: Update Gradle configuration and dependencies
- Standardize plugin versioning in `settings.gradle.kts` using `libs.versions.kotlin.get()`. - Update plugin declarations in `app/build.gradle.kts` to use ID strings and explicit versions for Firebase plugins. - Set explicit SDK versions in `app/build.gradle.kts`. - Add build config field for `ENCRYPTION_KEY`. - Enable multidex, vector drawable support, and Proguard. - Add test instrumentation arguments. - Replace `kapt` with `ksp` for Hilt. - Add dependencies for Kotlin Serialization, Coroutines, Lifecycle, DataStore, Coil, Accompanist, Firebase (config, ktx versions), Security, Biometric, and LeakCanary. - Update `gradle.properties`: - Enable caching. - Set JVM arguments and Java home. - Enable parallel builds.

MESSAGE.value:
Refactor: Update Gradle configuration and dependencies
- Standardize plugin versioning in `settings.gradle.kts` using `libs.versions.kotlin.get()`. - Update plugin declarations in `app/build.gradle.kts` to use ID strings and explicit versions for Firebase plugins. - Set explicit SDK versions in `app/build.gradle.kts`. - Add build config field for `ENCRYPTION_KEY`. - Enable multidex, vector drawable support, and Proguard. - Add test instrumentation arguments. - Replace `kapt` with `ksp` for Hilt. - Add dependencies for Kotlin Serialization, Coroutines, Lifecycle, DataStore, Coil, Accompanist, Firebase (config, ktx versions), Security, Biometric, and LeakCanary. - Update `gradle.properties`: - Enable caching. - Set JVM arguments and Java home. - Enable parallel builds.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
Refactor: Update Gradle configuration and dependencies
- Standardize plugin versioning in `settings.gradle.kts` using `libs.versions.kotlin.get()`. - Update plugin declarations in `app/build.gradle.kts` to use ID strings and explicit versions for Firebase plugins. - Set explicit SDK versions in `app/build.gradle.kts`. - Add build config field for `ENCRYPTION_KEY`. - Enable multidex, vector drawable support, and Proguard. - Add test instrumentation arguments. - Replace `kapt` with `ksp` for Hilt. - Add dependencies for Kotlin Serialization, Coroutines, Lifecycle, DataStore, Coil, Accompanist, Firebase (config, ktx versions), Security, Biometric, and LeakCanary. - Update `gradle.properties`: - Enable caching. - Set JVM arguments and Java home. - Enable parallel builds.
